survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Digital Wellness Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from employees regarding their satisfaction and experience with digital wellness tools provided by the company.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the digital wellness tools provided by the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure frequency of use. Ensure the options are clear and mutually exclusive.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the digital wellness tools provided by the company?

questions.question_text: Which of the following digital wellness tools have you used? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow selection of multiple tools. Include an option for respondents who haven't used any.

script.question_text: Which of the following digital wellness tools have you used? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital wellness tools provided by the company?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Ensure the scale is balanced.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the digital wellness tools provided by the company?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellness tools?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for the digital wellness tools?

questions.question_text: Have the digital wellness tools positively impacted your overall well-being?
answer_options: I have not used them enough to tell
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure perceived impact. Include an option for respondents who haven't used the tools enough.

script.question_text: Have the digital wellness tools positively impacted your overall well-being?
answer_options: I have not used them enough to tell
script.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
